dublinCore.dc:title: 119 SRES 362 ATS: To provide for the printing of the Senate Manual for the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. McConnell (for himself and Mr. Padilla) submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: To provide for the printing of the Senate Manual for the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.

section.text: That a revised edition of the Senate Manual for the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress be prepared by the Committee on Rules and Administration and printed as a Senate document, and that 1,200 additional copies shall be printed and bound for the use of the Senate, bound and delivered as may be directed by the Committee on Rules and Administration.
